name: ai-trader
description: DBot-style AI Trading Robot with advanced analytics

scripts.build: npm run install-deps && npm run build-frontend && npm run copy-build
scripts.copy-build: mkdir -p backend/.next && cp -r frontend/.next/* backend/.next/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Copy completed'
scripts.install-deps: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
